synopsis.text: Once a regular human girl, Hinako finds herself transformed into a lively anime character, eager to guide you through a fitness journey like no other! As a 16-year-old, she introduces viewers to essential exercises such as push-ups, sit-ups, and squats, all while donning eye-catching outfits that are sure to captivate the otaku audience. With Hinako's infectious enthusiasm and unique camera angles showcasing her routines, this first-ever muscle training animation is set to motivate and inspire you to get in shape!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
